desc: We make plant based mylks and mylkshakes in a range of flavours, fresh to order. Our mylks have no additives, no preservatives, no stabilisers, no thickeners, that’s nuts! Yes it is, but that means they’re good for you and good for the planet.

layout.text:
BUSINESS CURRENTLY UNDERGOING MANAGEMENT CHANGE WATCH THIS SPACE FOR UPDATES
Freshly made to order additive free, delicious plant based mylks. Helping the planet one drink at a time.
